title: dhIm tadhIm (t)
sahitya:
dhIm tadhIm takiTataka tajjham tajhaNu tAm tarita tAhata tarijham
dhIm tadhIm tajham taNam tatAm tatajhaNu tAm tarita takiTa tajhaNu taka
dhIm tadhIm tajham takiTa tajhaNu tAm tarita takajham takaNam tarijham takatA
dhIm tadhIm tajham takiTa tajhaNu tAm tarita takajhaNu taka


anupallavi

  udana dhIm tadhiranA dhirana tadhimi taka tajhaNu dhIm takiTataka
udana dhIm tadhiranA dhirana takadimi tAm takajhaNu dhIm takadhimi takajhaNu tAm takadhimi
udana dhIm tadhiranA dhirana tajham tarI taNa jhaNu takajhaNu tAm takundari dhIm tAjhaNu
udana dhIm tadhiranA dhirana takundari takajhaNu tAm takundari takajhaNu tAm takundari takajhaNu


caraNam    dAri nIvani nIdhAma gani ninu sadA nammiyunna nannu mudA dhanyu jEsi kAvavEmi kanaka
mAlyAbharaNi kamalavalli tAm tarita jhaNu tAm dhIm takiTa tajham taNam tadhImta takataLAngu
taka tajjham tadingiNatOm tajjham tadingiNatOm tajjham tadingiNatOm
